!** Validating the Freight provision sent in APPROVED status
!|Script              |MongoDBQuery                                                                                                                   |
|getMongoConnection;  |${connection}                             |db_pando_testing                                                                    |
|$erp_invoice_details=|getSrfCustomFreightProvisionPayload;      |$order_id                                                                           |
|check                |getRestHeaderValuesFromInvoicePayload;    |xmlns                  |http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/ont/rest/srfdelpicklist1/header|
|check                |getRestHeaderValuesFromInvoicePayload;    |Responsibility         |CAPEX MASTER                                                |
|check                |getRestHeaderValuesFromInvoicePayload;    |RespApplication        |JA                                                          |
|check                |getRestHeaderValuesFromInvoicePayload;    |SecurityGroup          |STANDARD                                                    |
|check                |getRestHeaderValuesFromInvoicePayload;    |NLSLanguage            |AMERICAN                                                    |
|check                |getRestHeaderValuesFromInvoicePayload;    |Org_Id                 |85                                                          |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|TRANSPORTER_CODE       |tr$unique                                                   |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|TRANSPORTER_NAME       |t$unique                                                    |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|INDENT_NUMBER          |$order_id                                                   |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|INDENT_STATUS          |APPROVED                                                    |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|TOTAL_INDENT_VALUE     |5000                                                        |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|SOURCE_CODE            |s$unique                                                    |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|GATE_CODE              |SG1$unique                                                  |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|SOURCE_NAME            |src$unique                                                  |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|DESTINATION_CODE       |dr$unique                                                   |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|DESTINATION_NAME       |dest$unique                                                 |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|MATERIAL_CODE          |mc$unique                                                   |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|DELIVERY_NO            |D$unique                                                    |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|INVOICE_NUMBER         |INV-$unique                                                 |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|INVOICE_AMOUNT         |5000                                                        |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|INVOICE_DATE           |$indate2                                                    |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|QUANTITY               |10                                                          |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|QUANTITY_UNIT          |cases                                                       |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|WEIGHT                 |400                                                         |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|WEIGHT_UNIT            |kg                                                          |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|VOLUME                 |1000                                                        |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|VOLUME_UNIT            |cft                                                         |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|BASE_FREIGHT_PROVISION |5000                                                        |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|OTHER_CHARGES_PROVISION|0                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|DETENTION_PROVISION    |0                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|TOTAL_FREIGHT_PROVISION|5000                                                        |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|BASE_FREIGHT_ACTUAL    |0                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|OTHER_CHARGES_ACTUAL   |0                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|DETENTION_ACTUAL       |0                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ACTUAL_FREIGHT_TOTAL   |0                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|FREIGHT_STATUS         |APPROVED                                                    |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE1             |2                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE2             |0                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE3             |0                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE4             |                                                            |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE5             |PER_TRIP                                                    |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE6             |                                                            |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE7             |1                                                           |
|check                |getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE8             |${invoice_number}                                           |

|comment                                                                                                                                              |
|check|getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE6|${transporter_ref_id}/SRF/s$num/100|//auto-generate-lr made false so this should be empty|
|check|getFreightDetailsValuesFromInvoicePayload;|ATTRIBUTE4|                                   |//timestampvalidation kept empty                     |

!|Script         |Common                                                                     |
|$schemaFilePath=|getPath;|data/schemafiles/srf_custom_freight_provision_schema.json|fullpath|

!|script|json                                                           |
|check  |validateJsonDocument;|$schemaFilePath|$erp_invoice_details|true|
*!
